item.sql: INSERT INTO screen_base_info ( sbi_cus_number, sbi_screen_id, sbi_other_idnty, sbi_screen_name, sbi_dept_id, sbi_width, sbi_height, sbi_row_num, sbi_column_num, sbi_crte_time, sbi_crte_user_id, sbi_updt_time, sbi_updt_user_id ) values( :sbi_cus_number, :sbi_screen_id, :sbi_other_idnty, :sbi_screen_name, :sbi_dept_id, :sbi_width, :sbi_height, :sbi_row_num, :sbi_column_num, SYSDATE, :sbi_crte_user_id, SYSDATE, :sbi_updt_user_id )

INSERT INTO screen_win_dtls ( dcr_cus_number, dcr_screen_id, dcr_screen_win_id, dcr_out_type, dcr_signal_id, dcr_decoder_id, dcr_decoder_chl, dcr_cut_seq, dcr_width, dcr_height, dcr_screen_top, dcr_screen_left, dcr_crte_time, dcr_crte_user_id, dcr_updt_time, dcr_updt_user_id ) values( :dcr_cus_number, :dcr_screen_id, :dcr_screen_win_id, :dcr_out_type, :dcr_signal_id, :dcr_decoder_id, :dcr_decoder_chl, :dcr_cut_seq, :dcr_width, :dcr_height, :dcr_screen_top, :dcr_screen_left, SYSDATE, :dcr_crte_user_id, SYSDATE, :dcr_updt_user_id )
SELECT sbi_screen_id, sbi_other_idnty, sbi_screen_name, sbi_dept_id, sbi_width, sbi_height, sbi_row_num, sbi_column_num FROM screen_base_info
DELETE screen_base_info WHERE sbi_cus_number = :sbi_cus_number AND sbi_screen_id = :sbi_screen_id
DELETE screen_win_dtls WHERE dcr_cus_number = :dcr_cus_number AND dcr_screen_id = :dcr_screen_id

item.sql: UPDATE screen_base_info SET sbi_other_idnty = :sbi_other_idnty, sbi_screen_name = :sbi_screen_name, sbi_dept_id = :sbi_dept_id, sbi_width = :sbi_width, sbi_height = :sbi_height, sbi_updt_time = SYSDATE, sbi_updt_user_id = :sbi_updt_user_id WHERE sbi_cus_number = :sbi_cus_number AND sbi_screen_id = :sbi_screen_id

UPDATE screen_win_dtls SET dcr_out_type = :dcr_out_type, dcr_signal_id = :dcr_signal_id, dcr_decoder_id = :dcr_decoder_id, dcr_decoder_chl = :dcr_decoder_chl, dcr_cut_seq = :dcr_cut_seq, dcr_updt_time = SYSDATE, dcr_updt_user_id = :dcr_updt_user_id WHERE dcr_cus_number = :dcr_cus_number AND dcr_screen_id = :dcr_screen_id AND dcr_screen_win_id = :dcr_screen_win_id
